mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_medical_record t WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_medical_record(patientID, patientName, patientCard, hospitalName, sectionName, diseaseName, note, drug, source, creator, createTime) VALUES (#{patientID}, #{patientName}, #{patientCard}, #{hospitalName}, #{sectionName}, #{diseaseName}, #{note}, #{drug}, #{source}, #{creator}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_medical_record SET patientID=#{patientID}, patientName=#{patientName}, patientCard=#{patientCard}, hospitalName=#{hospitalName}, sectionName=#{sectionName}, diseaseName=#{diseaseName}, note=#{note}, drug=#{drug}, source=#{source}, creator=#{creator}, updateTime=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
